title: Today Is the Last Day To Win a Decked-Out Santa Cruz Bronson and Help Fund LA-Fire Trail Restoration
content:
Santa Cruz, Chris King, Fox, Shimano, Reserve Wheels, and OneUp are putting together an absolutely boutique-level Bronson build, and they’re raffling it off to support Loewlifes Respectable Citizens Club in the monumental task of restoring trails that burned in the Eaton Fire north of Los Angeles. Just $5 gets you one entry, but the more you spend, the more entries you get. If you’re the lucky winner, you just pick your frame size, and wait for your dream bike to arrive.

Entries close at 11:59 PM Pacific time on May 6th 2025

The winner will be announced May 7th

Follow this link to enter.

About The Bike

  • Frame: Santa Cruz Bronson Carbon
  • Size: Winner’s Choice
  • Color: Kalimotxo
  • Shock: Fox Float X Live Valve Neo, 150mm
  • Fork: Fox 36 Factory, Grip X2, 160mm
  • Seatpost: Fox Transfer Neo, 175mm 
  • Drivetrain: Shimano XTR
  • Brakes: Shimano XTR
  • Rotors: Shimano 203mm front/ 180mm rear
  • Headset: Chris King, DropSet 3, Two Tone Black/Punch
  • Hubs: Chris King, Two Tone Black/Punch
  • Rims: Reserve 30|HD MX
  • Valves: Reserve Fillmore
  • Bar: OneUp Carbon, 800mm 
  • Stem: OneUp, 42mm
  • Pedals: OneUp Clip Pedal
  • Grips: Santa Cruz House
  • Tires: Maxxis
  • Saddle: WTB
  • What’s in the Glovebox: 1x Tube Bag, 1x Tool Bag,  1x OneUp EDC Tool/Pump
